title: Noam Chomsky on Ukraine Crisis — Democracy Now! Interview March 2, 2015
description:
Noam Chomsky discusses the Russia-Ukraine crisis in this March 2, 2015 Democracy Now! broadcast. He explains that “But the fact is, whatever you think about Putin—OK, irritable, rat-faced man with Asperger’s, whatever you like—the Russians have a case. And you have to understand the case. And the case is understood here by people who bother to think.”
